content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]

-- This is auto-generated code
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_delta/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
        FORMAT = ''DELTA''
    ) AS [result]'


EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_delta/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
        FORMAT = ''DELTA''
    ) AS [result]'


SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    )
WITH (
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    trip_type SMALLINT,
    year SMALLINT,
    month SMALLINT
) AS [result]


SELECT COUNT(trip_type)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT COUNT(trip_type)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE year = 2020 AND month = 10


SELECT
    year,
    month,
    COUNT(trip_type)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'delta'
    ) AS [result]
--WHERE year = 2020 AND month IN (01,02,03,04)
GROUP BY year,month
ORDER BY year,month
